title: Add customer reviews, pests & insects details, and more detailed treatment information

requirements.text: Add a "Customer Reviews" (testimonials) section to the marketing website, with multiple review cards showing reviewer name, star rating, short review text, and (optional) service type.

quotes: With customer reviews ... on this website ...

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a clearly labeled "Customer Reviews" section.
At least 6 testimonials are displayed as consistent cards (name + rating + review text; service type optional).
Section is responsive (looks good on mobile and desktop) and matches the siteâ€™s existing visual theme.
No backend is required to view testimonials (static content is acceptable).

requirements.text: Create a new "Pests & Insects" page that provides clear identification and basic info for common pests/insects relevant to pest control (e.g., cockroaches, termites, mosquitoes, bed bugs, ants, rodents), and add navigation links to this page from the header and footer.

quotes: ... Pests and Insects details on this website ...

acceptanceCriteria: A new route/page exists at a clear URL (e.g., /pests) and is accessible from both the SiteHeader navigation and SiteFooter quick links.
The page includes a grid/list of common pests/insects where each item includes: name, how to identify, typical signs, and basic prevention tips (English text).
The page uses existing UI components and styling conventions (cards/sections) and is responsive.
Existing routes (Home/Services/About/Contact) continue to work unchanged.

requirements.text: Expand the existing Services content to include more detailed information about effective pest treatment methods, including a clear "Our Treatment Process" section (inspection, identification, treatment, prevention, follow-up) and safety notes (family/pet safety and eco-friendly options) using user-facing English text.

quotes: ... more effective pest treatment details alsoare mentioned on this website

acceptanceCriteria: Services page includes a dedicated section describing the end-to-end treatment process in clear steps.
Services page includes safety guidance (e.g., preparation before treatment, aftercare, child/pet considerations) written in plain English.
Content is presented in a structured, scannable layout (cards, numbered steps, or accordions) consistent with the current design system.
No backend changes are required for these additional details.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the application as a static marketing site (no requirement for review submission, moderation, or persistence unless explicitly requested later).
Backend must remain single-actor; avoid adding backend work unless necessary (this change set should be frontend-only).
nonGoals: Building a backend/admin panel to create, edit, or store customer reviews.
Integrating third-party review platforms (e.g., Google Reviews) or external APIs.
Adding real-time features (chat, live updates) or third-party authentication beyond existing Internet Identity support.
